trans_title: A Química da Pixar: Tudo Sobre Elementos(巴西)
Die Chemie stimmt: Die Geschichte hinter Elemental(德)
Quando c'è chimica - La storia dietro Elemental(意)
『マイ・エレメント』が起こす奇跡の化学反応：メイキング映像(日)
元素大都會：製作特輯(港)
元素方城市：幕後特輯(台)
introduction: Pixar director Peter Sohn takes viewers on a humorous personal journey through the inspiration behind Disney and Pixar’s feature film “Elemental.” “Good Chemistry: The Story of Elemental” traces his parents’ voyage from Korea to New York, explores his dad’s former grocery shop in the heart of the Bronx, and delves into his choice of a career in animation, rather than the family business.Production company: Pixar Animation Studios
foreign_title: Good Chemistry: The Story of Elemental
